summary: 15+ years in construction estimation, excelled in complex infrastructure projects, enhancing cost efficiency by 15% on average.

bullets.text: Led comprehensive analysis of tendering documents, ensuring accuracy and minimization of risk in project bidding, successfully increasing awarded project rate by 20%.
Developed detailed Bill of Quantities (BOQ) for over 30 major buildings, resulting in a 98% accuracy rate and reducing unforeseen cost escalations by 15%.
Prepared commercial offers that incorporated full scope estimations with detailed assumptions and exclusions, securing contracts valued at over $100M USD.
Executed quantity take-off operations for civil projects including foundations, architectural, and structural elements, achieving a material waste reduction of 10%.
Managed cost estimations for landscaping, paving, and masonry, maintaining budgets strictly on target across five multi-million dollar projects, with budget accuracy within 5% of projections.
Spearheaded documentation approval processes for residential projects, achieving 100% compliance with government regulations and expedited project timelines by 30%.
Conducted post-project cost analysis on over 10 projects, leading initiatives that improved future costing methodologies by 25%.
Analyzed tender scopes of work, preparing accurate preliminary budgets that facilitated decision making processes for civil projects exceeding $20M USD in value.
Completed over 50 Bill of Quantities covering all tendering stages and final accounts, significantly improving project cost accuracy and resource allocation.
Authored detailed comparative cost reports for initial vs. final design discrepancies, leading to a 15% decrease in construction budget overruns.
Facilitated communication between contractors and builders to clarify scope, optimizing construction methods and achieving budgetary adherence on all projects.
Enhanced construction method proposals, successfully maintaining scope within allocated budgets across multiple high-profile infrastructure projects.
Oversaw cost consulting efforts with suppliers, contributing to negotiations that reduced supply chain expenses by 12%.
Directed quality control on cost estimations to ensure compliance with project specifications and stakeholder requirements, achieving complete client satisfaction.

education.additionalInfo: Special focus on construction economics and management.
Graduated with honors, top 5% of class.

additionalExperience: Active member of the Brazilian Council of Architecture and Urbanism since 2011. Volunteer architecture consultant for local community projects, improving public spaces and infrastructure.
